column3: love Kata Robata and I'm surprised I haven't reviewed them before. We've ordered to-go several times since Covid started and they knock it out of the part every time! Sushi doesn't travel that well
column4: but they do an amazing job packaging it. The quality of their fish is top-notch and it's worth the price. I prefer to eat on on their patio
column6: I'll keep ordering to-go when the craving hits!
